item.title: Dinonomicon
item.description: Welcome to Dinonomicon. This is a placeholder home page. You can customize it later.

item.title: AI & Dev Tools Stack
item.description: A curated list of tools for building websites, web apps, mobile apps, and supporting assets. Grouped by purpose rather than popularity.

item.title: My blog's folder structure
item.description: This vault serves two purposes at the same time.

item.title: Research for a diagonally-mounted projector
item.description: Scenario description A projector is required for a gate corridor, which will be used to project symbols like arrows or brand images/logos on the floor.

item.title: From LLMs to Agentic AI
item.description: This entry breaks down the architectural evolution of modern AI systems as shown in the diagram, moving from simple Large Language Model workflows to fully agentic, multi agent systems.

item.title: Roadmap for learning the Hungarian language
item.description: As some of you might know, my girlfriend is Hungarian.

item.title: Atomic design
item.description: Atomic design is a methodology composed of five distinct stages working together to create interface design systems in a more deliberate and hierarchical manner.

item.title: Keystone correction
item.description: When a projector is placed at an angle to the screen, the projected image becomes distorted into a trapezoid shape instead of a rectangle.

item.title: Lens-shift function
item.description: Lens shift is a mechanical adjustment in a projector that moves the lens inside the projector housing.

item.title: Projector light sources
item.description: Projector light sources fall into two broad families: traditional lamp-based sources and solid-state sources.
